title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\GetEntityTypeRequest
name: GetEntityTypeRequest
description:

methods.name: getName
methods.description:
Required. The name of the entity type.

Format: projects/<Project ID>/agent/entityTypes/<EntityType ID>.

Generated from protobuf field string name = 1;

methods.name: getLanguageCode
methods.description:
Optional. The language to retrieve entity synonyms for. If not specified, the agent's default language is used.

More than a dozen languages are supported. Note: languages must be enabled in the agent, before they can be used.

Generated from protobuf field string language_code = 2;
